entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening then changing to rain after midnight. Freezing rain inland. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Freezing rain inland early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
